subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Starter John Maine had the indignity of allowing home runs on three consecutive pitches, to the Dodgers’ Nos. 7-8-9 hitters, in the second inning, and the Mets never recovered.
snippet: Starter John Maine had the indignity of allowing home runs on three consecutive pitches, to the Dodgers’ Nos. 7-8-9 hitters, in the second inning, and the Mets never recovered.
